name: Wise Guys Men's Refuge & Community Housing Project
description: The Wise Guys Men’s Refuge & Community Emergency Housing Project, offers Emergency Accommodation, Emergency Housing, Urgent Accommodation as well as Long Term Accommodation for up to 50 men and women.  Our service is based in Kingseat, South Auckland.  We are also a Men’s Retreat / Men’s Shelter that specialize in helping men with nowhere to go, homeless or need help to get their lives back on track.
details: 24 hours, 7 days. Accommodation for up to 50 men and women.

name: Vision West
description: VisionWest Community Housing provides emergency, short term and long term supported Housing in West Auckland & Christchurch for those in need who cannot access private rental houses. The aim is to provide safe, healthy, affordable, quality housing
address: Building 13, 97 Glendale Road, Glen Eden, Auckland, 0641

footer: People in immediate need of somewhere to stay should call Work and Income on 0800 559 009 or call into their nearest Ministry of Social Development service centre.
